LETS_BUILD_CONTENT: One account, unlimited financial opportunity get started now
Register now or continue with your appli: Register now or continue with your application
LANG_CHANGE_SUCC: You have successfully changed the main language of the site
Upload_All_Documents: Please upload all documents before submitting
ESIGN_PROCESS_NOT_VALID: eSign process not validated, contact admin
Add_Max_Nominee: You cant have more than 3 nominees
IPV_FEATURE_ACTION: As a compliance requirement by SEBI for verification of users, in-person verification is mandatory. Please allow browser to access your camera and mic ...
ALLOW_CAMERA_ACCESS: Access to mic & camera is not enabled. Please enable access to camera and mic by adjusting your browsers 'settings'.
UPLOADING_CONTENT: Give us a moment, we’re uploading your document
UPLOADING_IPV_VIDEO: Give us a moment, we’re uploading your video
FORGOT_PASSWORD_TEXT: You will receive a password reset link over your email id. You can click on the link and set new password. Please note that the link will be valid only for 5 minutes.
RESET_PASSWORD_TEXT: You can reset your password here. Enter the new password and make sure it is strong.
Ooops! The page was not found: Ooops! The page was not found
invalid_mobile_number: Oops! You can’t proceed without a valid number.
invalid_otp_error: Your OTP should be a 6-digit number
need_email_id: We need your email ID to create your account.
invalid_pan_prompt_pan: We can’t move ahead without a valid PAN number
verify_dob_mandatory: Your date of birth is mandatory so we can verify your details
email_verifying_loader_message: Did you hear that beep? We have sent you an email to verify your account. Why don't you do it right away?
kra_verifying_loader_message: Bear with us while we fetch your KRA details. This will make your account opening a lot easier.
pan_verify_details_loader_message: Hold on while we verify your PAN details
cancel_cheque_document_title: Hello! Please take a picture and click on Save and Continue to upload the document. Make sure the picture is clear (not cut or blurry), otherwise application will be rejected.
photograph_cheque_document_title: Please take a clear picture on a clear background. No hats/ sunglasses please, save them for later.
income_proof_text_popup_text: We need some additional information to activate this segment.
signature_document_text: We need to verify your signature, please provide a valid one - upload or sign here.
Photograph_document_text: Please take a clear picture on a clear background. No hats/ sunglasses please, save them for later.
share_photocapture_link_text: You will get the link for photocapture and upload from there also.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, please try again later
image_size: Image size must be less than 5 MB
cant_upload_max: You can't upload more than 2 files
sign_in_with_credentails: Please sign in with your credentials.
something_went_wront_try_again: Something went wrong with server, Please try again.
bank_details_verify_loader_message: We are sending ₹1 to your bank account to welcome you to Arihant (and to verify that it is truly yours)!
get_in_touch_advisor: One of our advisors will get in touch with you to help you finish your application.
call_us: Do you need help? You can also contact on
logout_message: Logout successful, we hope to see you soon!
bank_mismatch_message: The name on your bank record does not match the name on your profile. Are you sure you added your own bank details? Our advisor will help you from here.
note_fno_activation_message: For F&O activation, we need to review the application which may take a few extra minutes. Our agent is on it!
percentage_must_be_hundred: Please adjust the percentage figure of all the nominees you’ve added and make sure it totals 100
application_already_approved: Your application is already approved. now you are not able to update the details
join_with_arihant: By proceeding I agree to the T&C, Privacy Policy and Tariff Rates and give my consent to open Demat and Trading account in Arihant Capital.
fetching_data_from_kra: I hereby permit data fetching from KRA/DIGILOCKER for this account opening.
